info.title: Open Education API
info.description:
OpenAPI (fka Swagger) specification for the Open Education API.
# Hypermedia API
The Open Education API is designed as a *hypermedia API*. In short, this means all responses will contain hypermedia links
to simplify the navigation between the different API calls. Each link (except `self`) is optional. When a specific link is
not provided, this could mean the relation does not exist or the targeted endpoint is not implemented. Each client is responsible
for checking and handling the links correctly.

# Error responses
Error responses are formatted in the `problem+json` media type ([RFC7807](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7807)):

```
{
  "code": 404,
  "title": "Resource not found"
}
```

tags.name: service metadata
tags.description: The service API provides additional metadata needed to make the OOAPI fit for this educational institution.

tags.name: institution
tags.description: Information on the institution (of higher education) that is exposing this API.

tags.name: persons
tags.description: The persons API provides information about persons related to an educational institute.

tags.name: faculties
tags.description: The faculties API provides The organizational parts of an organization (faculty, cluser, domain, etc.) Types can be extended in the metadata service.

tags.name: educational departments
tags.description: The educational departments API provides the organizational department that is responsible for the execution and recognition of courses.

tags.name: educational plans
tags.description: The educational plans API provides a coherent set of educational components, that a person is currently working on or is planning on completing. Usually based on an educationalProgramme.

tags.name: educational programmes
tags.description: The educational programmes API provides a coherent set of educational components, aimed at the realization of  competences or objectives in the field of knowledge, insight, attitudes and skills that the person who completes the program must have.

tags.name: course groups
tags.description: The course groups API provides collection of educational components (either courses or courseGroups) that can be offered as a whole to a person.

tags.name: courses
tags.description: The courses API provides a self-contained and formally structured learning experience. Aimed at providing learning outcomes to students. Usually placed in the context of an educationalProgramme.

tags.name: course offerings
tags.description: The course offerings API provides an instance of a course which has a global timeframe, e.g. a period to which students can enroll and specific lecturers are assigned.

tags.name: course results
tags.description: The course result API provides the aggregated result of a course based on the underlying test results by a student.

tags.name: test results
tags.description: The test result API provides the result of executing a test activity.

tags.name: buildings
tags.description: The building API provides a building that is currently used by the organization. Including all location details.

tags.name: rooms
tags.description: The rooms API provides the part of a building where an activity can take place. Including detail information on the resources available, number of seats, etc. (Updated continuously)

tags.name: schedules
tags.description: The schedules API provides the planned learning activity visible in a student view and a lecturer view. Schedules provide the answer to who, what, when, where, additional information for a learnign activity. (Updated on ad hoc-base)

tags.name: news feeds
tags.description: The news feeds API provides An aggregation of news items regarding a specific theme. (Updated on ad hoc-base)

tags.name: news items
tags.description: The news items API provides a message containing relevant information about an activity taking place a person or a resource. (Updated on ad hoc-base)

get.description: Get metadata for the service.

logo.description: URL of the service logo (image dimensions should be 300x300 pixels)

specification.description: URL of the API specification (YAML or JSON, compliant with [Open API Specification v3](https://github.com/OAI/OpenAPI-Specification/))

documentation.description: URL of the API documentation, including general terms and privacy statement

courseLevels.description: Set of course levels for the institution

roomTypes.description: Set of room types for the institution

get.description: Get institution data of provider of this service.

description.description: Any general description of the institution should clearly mention the type of higher education institution, especially in the case of a binary system. In Dutch; universiteit (university) or hogeschool (university of applied sciences).

academicCalendar.description: links to academic calenders per year

calender.description: Link to the academic calender of the institution (e.g. https://www.roosterrapporten.hu.nl/1718/jaarroosters/HU/timetable_academicyear_calender.pdf)

address.description: the full street address including house number and street name of main building

street.description: the full street address including house number and street name

additional.description: further details like building name, suite, apartment number, etc.
additional.example: On the other side of the road

educational-programmes.description: Link to the list of educational programmes at this institution

get.description: Get an ordered list of all persons.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of items per page

pageSize.description: The number of items per page

givenName.description: The first name of this person

surnamePrefix.description: The prefix of the family name of this person

surname.description: The family name of this person

displayName.description: The name of this person which will be displayed

dateOfBirth.description: The date of birth of this person, RFC3339 (full-date)

affiliations.description: The affiliations of how this person is associated with the organization

telephoneNumber.description: The telephone number at the office of this person

mobileNumber.description: The mobile number of this person

photoSocial.description: The url of the informal picture of this person

photoOfficial.description: The url of the official picture of this person

gender.description: The first letter of this person's gender

title.description: A title to be used for this person

office.description: The name of the office where this person is located

educationalDepartments.description: Link to the list of educational departments with which this person is affiliated

educationalPlans.description: Link to the list of educational plans with which this person is affiliated

courseGroups.description: Link to the list of course groups for this person

courses.description: Link to the list of courses for this person

courseResults.description: Link to the list of course results for this person

testResults.description: Link to the list of test results for this person

schedules.description: Link to list of the schedules for this person

get.description: Get an ordered list of all educational programmes.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of items per page

pageSize.description: The number of items per page

educationalProgrammeId.description: Unique id for this educational programme

name.description: The name of this educational programme

description.description: The description of this educational programme

termStartDate.description: The day on which this educational programme starts, RFC3339 (full-date)

termEndDate.description: The day on which this educational programme ends, RFC3339 (full-date)

ects.description: The number of EC's that can be archieved in this educational plan

mainLanguage.description: The main language in which the courses within this education plan are given, RFC3066

qualificationAwarded.description: Type of qualificaton that can be obtained on finishing the programme
qualificationAwarded.example: Bachelor of Arts, or Bachelor of Nursing

lenghtOfProgramme.description: The lenght of the programme specified in months

levelOfQualification.description: Level of qualification according to the National Qualification Framework and the European Qualifications Framework
levelOfQualification.example: E.g. Bachelor’s degree; EQF for LLL level 6; NLQF level 6

profileOfProgramme.description: brief description of the main focus of the programme.

programmeLearningOutcomes.description: List the learning outcomes at programme level. It is advisable to limit the number of learning outcomes to approximately 20. It is also advisable to make sure that the programme learning outcomes in the course catalogue correspond with those on the Diploma Supplement.

modeOfStudy.description: Indicate whether the programme is e.g. full-time, part-time, dual, e-learning.

courses.description: Link to the list of courses for this educational programme

get.description: Get a list of all courses, ordered by name (ascending).

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of items per page

pageSize.description: The number of items per page

abbreviation.description: The abbreviation or internal code used to identify this course (ECTS-code)

ects.description: The number of EC's that is earned when the course is completed successfully (ECTS-ects)

description.description: The description of this course (ECTS-description)

learningOutcomes.description: Statements that describe the knowledge or skills students should acquire by the end of a particular course (ECTS-learningoutcome)

goals.description: The description of the main goal of this course

requirements.description: The requirements needed to enter this course (ECTS-prerequisites)

level.description: The level of this course (see service metadata for possible values) (ECTS-year of study if applicable)

format.description: The format in which this course is given (ECTS-format) (mutlivalue)

modeOfDelivery.description: information on the mode of delivery of the component, e.g. via e-learning, face-to-face, etc. (ECTS-Mode of delivery)

mainLanguage.description: The main language in which this course is given, RFC3066 (ECTS-language of instriction)

enrollment.description: The extra information that is provided for enrollment

resources.description: An overview of the literature and other resources that is used in this course (ECTS-recommended reading and other sources)

exams.description: A description of the way exams for this course are taken  (ECTS-assessment method and criteria)

schedule.description: A description of the timeframes, when this course takes place (ECTS-Semester/trimester when the component is delivered)

link.description: The url containing the address of the website with more information about the course

courseOfferings.description: Link to the list of courseOfferings for this course

coordinator.description: Link to the coordinator (person) that is responsible, and can be contacted for this course

title.description: The display name of the person

lecturers.description: Links to the lecturers (persons) of this course (ECTS-lecturers)

title.description: The display name of the person

courseResults.description: Link to the course results for this course

testResults.description: Link to the test results for this course

faculties.description: Links to the faculties where this course is given

title.description: The name of the faculty

educationalDepartments.description: Links to the educational departments where this course is given

title.description: The name of the educational department

educationalPlans.description: Links to the educational plans where this course is part of

title.description: The name of the educational plan

educationalProgrammes.description: Links to the educational programmes where this course is part of

title.description: The name of the educational programme

courseGroup.description: Links to the course groups where this course is part of

title.description: The name of the course group

get.description: Get a list of all course results, ordered by result date (descending).

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of items per page

parameters.name: academicYear
parameters.description: Filter by the academic year this result has been achieved in (e.g. `2017-2018`)

pageSize.description: The number of items per page

courseResultId.description: Unique id of this course result

passed.description: Boolean, representing whether the student did or did not pass the course

grade.description: The average of the test results

comment.description: The comment on the result for the course

resultDate.description: The date this result has been published, RFC3339 (full-date)

academicYear.description: The academic year this result has been achieved in (e.g. `2017-2018`)

course.description: Link to the course for this result

title.description: The name of the course

student.description: Link to the student (person) for this result

title.description: The display name of the person

testResults.description: Link to the list of test results of the tests made by the student for this course

get.description: Get a list of all schedules, ordered by startDateTime (ascending).

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of items per page

parameters.name: startDateTime
parameters.description: Filter by minimum startDateTime, RFC3339 (date-time). Default is date-time value of today

parameters.name: endDateTime
parameters.description: Filter by maximum endDateTime, RFC3339 (date-time). Default is date-time value of today + 1 month

pageSize.description: The number of items per page

startDateTime.description: The moment on which this schedule starts, RFC3339 (date-time)
